title: AI's Thirst for Data Centers May Drain Water Supplies
description: Bitcoin mining isn't the only environmental scourge—time to rage against AI.

title: Digital Currency Group subsidiary Luno to pause certain UK services, citing forthcoming regulations
description:
Luna, a subsidiary of Digital Currency Group (DCG), will soon pause certain services in the U.K., according to a report on Sept. 11. That report indicates that the company will halt some crypto trading features by Oct. 6 in advance of new rules set by the U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). Those rules will severely […]

The post Digital Currency Group subsidiary Luno to pause certain UK services, citing forthcoming regulations appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: ‘End of 2023 Will Not Be Great for XRP,’ Says Prominent XRP Figure
description:
Jungle, a top XRP figure, believes that the end of 2023 may not be great for XRP. The analyst cited economic factors such as rising interest rates and the ongoing housing market for his caution. However, he pointed out some positive developments in the crypto industry on the horizon. In a recent tweet, a prominent […]

The post ‘End of 2023 Will Not Be Great for XRP,’ Says Prominent XRP Figure appeared first on Coin Edition.
